meanings.definition: To spend time doing nothing or being idle.
meanings.sent1: She was lazying on the couch all day.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys lazying around on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat was lazying in the sun, not a care in the world.
meanings.sent4: The clouds lazying across the sky reminded her of carefree days.
meanings.sent5: The image of him lazying by the pool stuck in her mind.

meanings.sent1: Stop lazying around and help with the chores!
meanings.sent2: She was lazying in bed instead of getting ready for work.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was lazying on the tree branch, not gathering nuts.
meanings.sent4: The river lazying through the valley reflected the peaceful surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The child lazying on the swing giggled with joy.

meanings.definition: To relax or take it easy.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, she enjoys lazying in a warm bath.
meanings.sent2: He was lazying by the pool, soaking up the sun.
meanings.sent3: The dog lazying on the porch wagged its tail lazily.
meanings.sent4: The music lazying in the background added to the calming atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The couple lazying on the beach watched the sunset together.
